ff_multi_meta.description: A multiple extension addon for BitTorrent Surf that provides Surf and the required TorqueChrome plugin.
ff_multi_meta.author: Bittorrent, Inc.
ff_multi_meta.name: surf-multi

meta.name: surf
meta.author: Bittorrent, Inc.
meta.full_description:
Discover and download torrents, directly in your browser.  

Search 

Quickly find torrents across multiple search sites.  
Automatically detect search sites.  
And add your favorite sites to create a search custom engine.

Download

Get media from sites like the Internet Archive directly from your search results, in one click.  
Stay updated while you Surf: manage downloads and notifications from your browser.  
File health estimates help you select the best quality media to download.  

Play

Just push play.  
Surf is simply the most beautiful, fluid and streamlined way to find, access and enjoy Internet content.
meta.description: Discover and download torrents, directly in your browser.

TorqueChrome.description: This is a single extension whose sould purpose is to load the TorqueChrome plugin for use in a separate extension built on the Add-On SDK.
TorqueChrome.creator: Bittorrent, Inc.
TorqueChrome.name: BitTorrent TorqueChrome Plugin
